quests.name: The Optics of a Second Chance
objectives:
Find Jafar's tools in the Cave of Wonders.
  ‧ 1 Polished Mirror.
  ‧ 2 Photonic Lever.

Search in EVE's House for:
  ‧ 3 Power Cables.

Make sure you have all of Jafar's tools:
  ‧ 1 Polished Mirror.
  ‧ 2 Photonic Lever.
  ‧ 3 Power Cables.
Bring Jafar's tools back to him.

Find Gems on Eternity Isle:
  ‧ Jade.
  ‧ Spinel.
  ‧ Bumblestone.
  ‧ Alexandrite.
  ‧ Evergem.
Craft the Dimensional Prism.
Meet Jafar at his Laboratory in the Palace.
Talk to Jafar in his Laboratory.

Install everything for the experiment:
  ‧ Plug in the cables from the Power Coil to the Door.
Open the Experiment Chamber using the door lever.
Place the Dimensional Prism on the Pedestal.
Enter the Experiment Chamber and install the Geometrically Impaired Objects in the Experiment Slots.

Proceed with Jafar's optics experiment:
  ‧ Close the door.

Proceed with Jafar's optics experiment:
  ‧ Activate the power lever near the Mirror.

Open the door to the Experiment Chamber and gather the repaired items:
  ‧ Geometrically Stabilized Cactus.
  ‧ Geometrically Stabilized Statue.
  ‧ Geometrically Stabilized Tree.
Show the repaired items to Jafar.

Decorate with the stabilized objects in their proper Biomes:
  ‧ Geometrically Stabilized Cactus.
  ‧ Geometrically Stabilized Statue.
  ‧ Geometrically Stabilized Tree.
Check back with Jafar about the anomaly.

quests.name: The Alchemical Revolution
objectives: Find Iron Ore to bring to EVE
Bring Iron Ore to EVE.
Meet Jafar in his laboratory.
Return to Jafar's Laboratory.
Talk to Jafar about the next Alchemical step.

Perform your first alchemical experiment:
  ‧ Turn Iron Dust into Gold by mixing it at the Alchemy Table.
Make sure you have the Alchemical Gold in your Inventory.
Give the Alchemical Gold to Jafar.

Approach other alchemically minded Villagers.
  ‧ Ursula.
  ‧ Jack Skellington.
  ‧ The Fairy Godmother.

Gather the unique Alchemical Ingredients:
  ‧ Fish an Ancient Sand-Polished Stone from quicksand in The Borderlands.
  ‧ Grow a Mini Holiday Tree using Jack Skellington's Holiday Seeds.
  ‧ Catch the Book flying around Ancient's Landing.

Make sure you have all the unique Alchemical Ingredients in your Inventory:
  ‧ Ancient Sand-Polished Stone.
  ‧ Mini Holiday Tree.
  ‧ Book of Fairy Magic.
Return to Jafar's Laboratory in the Palace.

Make sure you have in your Inventory:
  ‧ Ancient Sand-Polished Stone.
  ‧ Mini Holiday Tree.
  ‧ Book of Fairy Magic.
Give the Alchemical Ingredients to Jafar.

Mix Minor Essences to brew the Major Essences for the Gilded Stone (Use any combination of 3 Minor Essences from the resource table).
  ‧ Essence of Will.
  ‧ Essence of Wonder.
  ‧ Essence of Wishes.

Make sure you have the 3 Major Essences:
  ‧ Major Essence of Will.
  ‧ Major Essence of Wonder.
  ‧ Major Essence of Wishes.
Bring the 3 Major Essences to Jafar.
Return to the Alchemy Table in Jafar's Laboratory.
Try to create the Gilded Stone using your 3 Major Essences.
Make sure you have the Mysterious Stone in your Inventory.
Your experimentation produced something strange! Show the Mysterious Stone to Jafar.

Seek the Emotive Essences by:
  ‧ 5 Gifting favorite items to Villagers.
  ‧ 5 Performing Dreamlight Duties.

Look around the center Wishing Well on Eternity Isle for:
  ‧ Essence of Wisdom.
  ‧ Essence of Benevolence.
Show the Emotive Essences to Jafar.

quests.name: The Serpent's Gift
objectives:
Decorate with Jafar's Imagination Generators in:
  ‧ Lagoon.
  ‧ Borderlands.
  ‧ Docks.
  ‧ Near Oswald's House.
Wait 10 minutes for Jafar's machines to start working.
Talk to Oswald to see if Jafar's machines cheered him up.
Cook up a Poutine for Oswald.
Bring the Poutine to Oswald to fill him up.

Oswald is still feeling odd. Check up on other Villagers.
  ‧ Gaston.
  ‧ Scrooge McDuck.
  ‧ Rapunzel.
Everyone is acting strangely — maybe check in with EVE.

Investigate the three Villagers' homes for whatever Jafar planted.
  ‧ Rapunzel's Tower.
  ‧ Gaston's Lodge.
  ‧ Scrooge McDuck's Store.

Make sure everyone is feeling normal once more:
  ‧ Listen to Rapunzel and Scrooge McDuck just outside Scrooge's Store.

Make sure everyone is feeling normal once more:
  ‧ Check in with Gaston.

Investigate the Ancient Ruins.
  ‧ Search for Jafar's secret machine.
Confront Jafar about his sinister plot.
Find the 3 power sources to Jafar's Machines and short-circuit them with your Royal Watering Can.
Break 3 Jafar's Machines using your Pickaxe while Jafar is distracted.
Check in with Oswald.
Confront Jafar.

quests.name: The Trial of Eternity
objectives:
Prepare for the Trial with the Villagers:
  ‧ Rapunzel.
  ‧ Gaston.
  ‧ Oswald.
  ‧ Remy.
  ‧ EVE.
  ‧ Scrooge McDuck.

Gather the resources needed to craft the Trial furnishings:
  ‧ 20 Tropical Wood.
  ‧ 10 Brass Ingots.
  ‧ 10 Plastic Scraps.
  ‧ 6 Bamboo.
  ‧ 2 Fiber.
Craft the trial furnishings:

-2 Attorney Stands.
  ‧ 2 Bamboo Benches.
Head to the Ancient Ruins to oversee the progress on the courtroom.

Make sure you have:
  ‧ 2 Attorney Stands.
  ‧ 2 Benches.
Bring the Trial furniture to Gaston.
Check in with Oswald about his hunt for a Dreamlight Judge.

Dress up like a fancy Judge using:
  ‧ The Commodore's Powdered Wig.
  ‧ Some Elegant Clothing.
(Optional: Order the Commodore's Powdered Wig from Scrooge McDuck's Store).
Return to the Ancient Ruins to begin the Trial.

Begin the Trial:
  ‧ Go near the Judge's Chair in the Ancient Ruins.
  ‧ Let Scrooge and Jafar debate.
Talk to Gaston to hear his testimony.
Listen to the debate in the courtroom.

Let Oswald come to the Witness Stand next.
  ‧ Stay near the Judge's Chair in the Ancient Ruins.

Let Oswald come to the Witness Stand next.
  ‧ Talk to Oswald and hear his testimony.

Use the Royal Hourglass to track down good memories of Jafar in:
  ‧ The Borderlands.
  ‧ The Lagoon.
  ‧ The Overlook.
Return to your Judge's chair in the courtroom in the Ancient Ruins.
Give your final judgement to Jafar.

quests.name: Making Amends
objectives: Wait 1 hour for Jafar to reflect on his sentence.
Talk to Jafar about his community service.

Guide Jafar to goodness by cooking some tasty meals:
  ‧ Falafel.
  ‧ Makrout.
  ‧ Shish Taouk.

Make sure you have Jafar's favorite meals in your Inventory.
  ‧ Falafel.
  ‧ Makrout.
  ‧ Shish Taouk.
Bring the meals to Jafar.

Make sure you are hanging out with Jafar and feed each type of animal on Eternity Isle.
  ‧ A Monkey.
  ‧ A Cobra.
  ‧ A Capybara.
See how Jafar liked feeding the animals.

Get impressions from Eternity Isle Villagers about the newly "reformed" Jafar:
  ‧ EVE.
  ‧ Gaston.
  ‧ Rapunzel.
  ‧ Oswald.
Ask Merlin about his impression of Jafar.

Decorate to Jafar's tastes near the Palace in the Borderlands or Promenade:
  ‧ Red.
  ‧ Black.
  ‧ Bold.
  ‧ Traditional.
  ‧ Elegant.
Place the Homage to Iago when you are ready.
Take a picture of everyone at the celebration.
See how Jafar liked the celebration.
